page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT INDUSTRIAL LCING
page.content: In Lancing the main source of Employment is the Industrial Estate. On the Industrial Estate there are approximately 20 different firms.These include HUNTING HIVOLT,LINK MILES,SKILL CENTRE, ESCHMANNS and the CUB SCOUTS PREMISES.If the industrial Estate ever closed down there would be about 10,000 people out of work.A member of our group (TRACY CHADWICK) phoned MR.M. BOND, a director of Singer LINK MILES which is the largest factory on the estate,to make an appointment for the 25th June.In the actual factory there are 16 differant sections which are managed by two different managers. MR.BOND took us around to see the simulators being made. Link Miles has been awarded 3 awards in 1978,1984 and 1985 for best production. The simulators are distributed all over the world.
